title: Fresh spring rolls with chicken
ingredients: ['240ml peanut sauce', '1 (3.75cm) piece fresh root ginger, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '450g skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, cut into 2.5cm pieces', '1 teaspoon groundnut oil', '6 ounces fresh mange-tout', '175g bean sprouts', '4 spring onions, chopped', '450g watercress, chopped', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', '2 large carrots, peeled', '1 teaspoon groundnut oil', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '12 spring roll wrappers (made of rice)', '125ml peanut sauce']
